name: S.I.P.
description: Using the CocktailDB API, The Spirit Indexing Program can help you find cocktail recipes and inspiration for your available spirits, or find a bartender than can make some for you. Uses jQuery to dynamically render DOM elements.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: This application utilizes the OpenWeather API, jQuery library, and Moment.js to supply and persist data for a city-searchable weather dashboard.

name: Day Planner
description: A work-day scheduler with color-coded time blocks for past, present, and future that allow user-fillable notes to be saved with click of a button. Uses jQuery and Moment.js.

name: CMS Techblog
description: This application is a live CMS-style tech blog utilising a basic Model-View-Controller architecture.  The front-end is rendered using the Handlebars.js template with the back-end being constructed using the MySQL database language via the Sequelize package. The application is deployed live through Heroku.
